reasoning: Junctional epidermolysis bullosa is a rare genetic skin disorder with incidence approximately 0.1-0.2 per 100k live births. Subtype of EB with mutations in genes encoding hemidesmosomes.
source: Fine JD et al. (2014). Inherited epidermolysis bullosa: updated recommendations on diagnosis and classification. J Am Acad Dermatol. 70(6):1103-1126
